response.original_title: Sesame Street: Arts and Crafts Playdate
response.overview: Learn to be art smart with Elmo. When Zoe's pet rock, Rocco, needs a friend, Elmo uses arts and crafts to build a new friend out of ordinary things on Sesame Street. Elmo also makes a collage with the help of his Sesame Street friends. Both of these stories are followed by the rest of their full hour episodes filled with additional art films and favorite segments like Elmo the Musical, Elmo's world, and Murray Art School.
response.title: Sesame Street: Arts and Crafts Playdate
